p: The mosquito samples used for image capture were obtained from the Parasitology Laboratory of the Federal University of Bahiaâ€“UFBA (Salvador, Brazil) and were also collected in the field. The samples obtained from UFBA were Ae. aegypti mosquitos (10 females and 6 males). The capture of adult insects in the field resulted in the collection of 73 specimens of Ae. aegypti, 94 specimens of Ae. albopictus and 110 specimens of C. quinquefasciatus.
